About

Welcome! My name is Peter Hlavena and I am the one you need in case you desire a modern and attractive website. I am freelanced developer of websites and webapps and this is a portfolio of my work. I live in Prague and webdevelopment is not only my job, but my hobby as well.

Projects

ZLATO.CZCMS system WORDPRESS is the core of project Zlato.cz. Within the team cooperation I was focused on creation of HTML templates, their styling and javaScript logic.Online

BLUE STYLEExtensive team project Blue Style is besides customer web (B2C) enhanced by web for tour sellers (B2B). Styling, creation of HTML templates (e.g. tours searching tool, details of hotels) and javaScript logic (B2B) of this project are my presentation.Online

ZENTIVAInteractive elements optimized for iPad are attractive features that impress every user for sure. It is about creation of animated presentations using HTML5, CSS3 and library jQuery.Online
